mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (member_email, member_pass, member_name, member_phone, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{memberEmail}, #{memberPass}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT member_id as memberId, member_email as memberEmail, member_pass as memberPass, member_name as memberName, member_phone as memberPhone, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM MEMBER WHERE member_email = #{email}

SELECT member_id as memberId, member_email as memberEmail, member_pass as memberPass, member_name as memberName, member_phone as memberPhone, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM MEMBER WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE member_email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET member_name = #{memberName}, member_phone = #{memberPhone}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
UPDATE MEMBER SET member_pass = #{newPassword}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
